{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Executive Assistant (Female) to the CEO",
  "description": "Lamlan Digital Solution Limited&nbsp;is a&nbsp;multi-national&nbsp;digital marketing agency that&nbsp;&nbsp;partners with ambitious startups and businesses to build powerful brand presence and drive revenue through paid ads, content marketing, and digital strategy.&nbsp;We&rsquo;re not just marketers we&rsquo;re business enablers.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Executive Assistant (Female) to the CEO

Job Location:&nbsp;Lekki, Ajah - Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Act as the point of contact between the Executive Director and internal/external clients
	Manage daily To-Do list of Executive Director
	Screen and direct phone calls and distribute correspondence
	Handle requests and queries appropriately
	Manage diary and schedule meetings and appointments
	Make travel arrangements
	Take dictation and minutes
	Source office supplies
	Produce reports, presentations, proposals, invoice and briefs.


Qualifications


	Minimum of Second-Class Upper Degree in any course. First Class and a Master&rsquo;s Degree will be an added advantage.
	Previous experience as a Personal/executive assistant is highly required.
	Must have a presentable and ellegant appearance.


Skills&nbsp;and&nbsp;Competencies:


	Ability to research and report
	Must be highly intelligent
	Work with minimal supervision
	Proficient computer skills, including good knowledge of social media and little knowledge on digital marketing.
	Very good oral and written communication.
	Good familiarity and knowledge of Nigeria entertainment industry.
	Ready to travel.


Benefits


	Salary: N250,000 - N350,000 monthly
	A suitable working environment with other intelligent creators and smart tech individuals.
	Available Accomodation if needed
	Foreign business trips
	frequent bonuses based on performance
	A good and latest laptop and phone to aid your work.
	Great % of bonus on every deal directly faciliated by the staff.
	You never work on your birthday
	Super fast StarLink internet access.
	Annual leave.
",
  "datePosted": "2025-12-05",
  "validThrough": "2025-12-13",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",

Executive Assistant (Female) to the CEO Job at Lamlan Digital Solution Limited




        
    

        
        Lamlan Digital Solution Limited is a multi-national digital marketing agency that  partners with ambitious startups and businesses to build powerful brand presence and drive revenue through paid ads, content marketing, and digital strategy. We’re not just marketers we’re business enablers.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Executive Assistant (Female) to the CEO

Job Location: Lekki, Ajah - Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Act as the point of contact between the Executive Director and internal/external clients
	Manage daily To-Do list of Executive Director
	Screen and direct phone calls and distribute correspondence
	Handle requests and queries appropriately
	Manage diary and schedule meetings and appointments
	Make travel arrangements
	Take dictation and minutes
	Source office supplies
	Produce reports, presentations, proposals, invoice and briefs.


Qualifications


	Minimum of Second-Class Upper Degree in any course. First Class and a Master’s Degree will be an added advantage.
	Previous experience as a Personal/executive assistant is highly required.
	Must have a presentable and ellegant appearance.


Skills and Competencies:


	Ability to research and report
	Must be highly intelligent
	Work with minimal supervision
	Proficient computer skills, including good knowledge of social media and little knowledge on digital marketing.
	Very good oral and written communication.
	Good familiarity and knowledge of Nigeria entertainment industry.
	Ready to travel.


Benefits


	Salary: N250,000 - N350,000 monthly
	A suitable working environment with other intelligent creators and smart tech individuals.
	Available Accomodation if needed
	Foreign business trips
	frequent bonuses based on performance
	A good and latest laptop and phone to aid your work.
	Great % of bonus on every deal directly faciliated by the staff.
	You never work on your birthday
	Super fast StarLink internet access.
	Annual leave.
    

    

        Click here to Apply
